content: MT-C-T/1 OC Transverse connector Wing fitting for assembling strut channel structures, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Flexible – allows a horizontal strut element to be attached to any face of a vertical strut member Adaptable – unlike welding, angle brackets allow you to modify strut channel framing during installation and for future MEP requirements Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Right-angle connections between any MT strut channels, on any side Assembling 2D metal framing for MEP support structures Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use Material thickness: 6 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2272042 - Connector MT-C-T/1 OC transversal - Package Size 20 pc
